page.title: 18Festival (1), Bowness.
page.content: The{Lake Windermere Festival}is from 6th _ 14th July and the theme for this year was{'England Entertains'.}On the first Saturday there was a parade with decorated floats and{fancy dress.} On Sunday there was a{Charity Football {Match}between local people and a{ {Showbiz XI.}During the week there is {Robert Brothers Circus}on{Rayrigg {Meadow}with{Tight Rope Walkers,Dancing {Elephants,Clowns{Lion Tamers}and{'Jip' the Wonder Horse. The prices are Â£6 for a front seat and Â£2 for a back one. On Monday there was a{Tug of War} Competition between local pubs and clubs. There are{helicopter}rides at Â£9 a time, an{Army Assault Course, {Punch and Judy Show,}and a large inflatable bouncer every day of the week.
